Class CopyInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.util.CopyInfo

  • public class CopyInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    CopyInfo contains all necessary information needed for asynchronous copy operations.

    1.0
